name: homebridge-dingz
author: johannrichard
description: Homebridge Plugin for dingz & myStrom Devices. Implements some (but not all, due to API limitations) functions of a [dingz](https://dingz.ch) Smart Home Device.

scripts.watch: npm run build && npm link && nodemon
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.release:major: npm run prepare && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'ci(docs): updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prepare && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'ci(docs): updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run prepare && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'ci(docs): updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
